email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. We are offering a freight rate of $22/MT on CIF terms. The laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you consider $20/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. The loading window is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is $10,000 per day. The best I can do is $21/MT. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the update. We can proceed at $21/MT. Please send the recap with all the details.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: $21/MT CIF
- Laycan: 15-20 October
- Demurrage: $10,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The recap looks good. We are ready to proceed. Please confirm the laycan and ensure the vessel is ready for loading.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for confirming. The laycan is confirmed as 15-20 October, and the vessel will be ready for loading. Looking forward to a smooth operation.

Best regards,
Emily
